comments: Contract with Task Authorizations. This contract was sole-sourced. This contract includes one or more amendments.A task authorization for a pre-qualified contractor (using the SELECT procurement tool) for mechanical engineering at various locations on PEI . Amended as additional work was requried to complete all costing and analysis elements of an Investment Analysis Report for a Charlottetown facility: it was more efficient and net lower cost to complete the work with the contractor who had undertaken the earlier phases.
